title: Caribbean Spice: A Contemporary Romance
description: Stacy’s love life was as dry as the husk on a Jamaican coconut, since her last relationship ended.Ever since, James had helped her with her disgruntled ex boyfriend she’d tried hard not to consider him as anything other than a friend.Yet, when she has to leave London she has to decide if seizing the moment was more important than living her life with regret.Still, she couldn’t forget that her ex had treated her like a beating post.Though, James and Donovan were nothing alike. She couldn’t help her urge to run like the wind when things heat up between her and James.What will it take to convince Stacy that these two men were like chalk and cheese?When will she stop running?What will James have to do to prove to her that not all men are the same?
author: Ondia Morris
